definition: the Thirteen Confucian Classics, namely: Book of Songs 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], Book of History 尚書|尚书[Shang4 shu1], Rites of Zhou 周禮|周礼[Zhou1 li3], Rites and Ceremonies 儀禮|仪礼[Yi2 li3], Classic of Rites 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], Mr Zuo's Annals 左傳|左传[Zuo3 Zhuan4], Mr Gongyang's Annals 公羊傳|公羊传[Gong1 yang2 Zhuan4], Mr Guliang's Annals 穀梁傳|谷梁传[Gu3 liang2 Zhuan4], The Analects 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], Erya 爾雅|尔雅[Er3 ya3], Classic of Filial Piety 孝經|孝经[Xiao4 jing1], Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3]
thirteen peaks of Meri snow mountains in Diqing Tibetan autonomous prefecture 迪慶藏族自治州|迪庆藏族自治州[Di2 qing4 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan/also written 梅里雪山[Mei2 li3 xue3 shan1]
the Ming tombs (mausoleum park of the Ming emperors in Changping district of Beijing)

sentences.english: The three side not to worry, thirteen hit Fuping hou.
sentences.chinese: 七國三邊未到憂，十三身襲富平侯。

sentences.english: China has 1.3 billion people, more than any other country in the world.
sentences.chinese: 中國有十三億人口，居全球之冠。

sentences.english: The fire broke out on the morning of Dec. 23, 1991.
sentences.chinese: 這次火災發生於1991年十二月二十三日的早晨。

sentences.english: From the Yongle Emperor onwards, 13 Ming Dynasty Emperors were buried in this area.
sentences.chinese: 自永樂帝開始，明朝十三陵共埋葬了十三位皇帝。

sentences.english: From the Yongle Emperor onwards, 13 Ming Dynasty Emperors were buried in this area.
sentences.chinese: 自永樂帝開始，明朝十三陵共埋葬了十三位皇帝。

sentences.english: Deaths are rare, fewer than thirteen thousand a year.
sentences.chinese: 死亡是罕見的，不到十三萬一年。

sentences.english: Within a short while the 13th Army Group was completely wiped out, with all its troops surrendered.
sentences.chinese: 第十三兵團隨即全軍覆沒，所屬部隊全部投降。

sentences.english: Joachaz was three and twenty years old when he began to reign, and he reigned three months in Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 約阿哈次登極時二十三歲，在耶路撒冷爲王三個月。

sentences.english: I am thirty-three years old, and I am so happy that I am not a mother.
sentences.chinese: 我今年三十三歲，很高興沒有成爲一名母親。

sentences.english: There are fifty-three students in our cla .
sentences.chinese: 我們班上有五十三名學生。

sentences.english: The earliest stock exchanges emerge in Bruges and Italy in the thirteenth century.
sentences.chinese: 十三世紀，最早的股票交易所出現於布魯日與意大利。

sentences.english: Remember that trip to the Ming Tombs on our bicycles?
sentences.chinese: 記得我們騎自行車去明十三陵的那次旅行嗎？

sentences.english: Mt. 13:58 And He did not do many works of power there because of their unbelief.
sentences.chinese: 太十三58因爲他們不信，他就不在那裏多行異能了。

sentences.english: Both Jesus and Alexander died at age 33.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌和亞歷山大都死於三十三歲的英年。

sentences.english: We are talking to Alan , a thirteen-year-old boy.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在和艾倫，一個十三歲的男孩談話。

sentences.english: And she shall then continue in the blood of her purifying three and thirty days;
sentences.chinese: 婦人在產血不潔之中，要家居三十三天。
